suncertify.db.domain
Class Persistent

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.db.domain.Persistent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, IDomain
Direct Known Subclasses:
Contractor
public abstract class Persistent
extends Object
implements IDomain, Serializable

Persistent is the abstract class that is to be extended by all persistent objects in the domain model - it also implements common methods for all domain objects.

Author:
Przemyslaw Bielicki
See Also:
IDomain, Serialized Form
